## BinariesService class

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class BinariesService
```

## Methods

| Method                                                                                                                                             | Modifiers           | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [downloadFile({ tempFileId, filename, })](./open-api-client.binariesservice.downloadfile.md)                                                       | <code>static</code> | Downloads the temporary file for a binary file that was previously uploaded.                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| [downloadItemBinary({ escapedItemId, })](./open-api-client.binariesservice.downloaditembinary.md)                                                  | <code>static</code> | Downloads the binary content of a Multimedia Component as a file.                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| [getFileThumbnail({ tempFileId, fileExtension, width, height, })](./open-api-client.binariesservice.getfilethumbnail.md)                           | <code>static</code> | Gets the thumbnail image of an uploaded binary file (or the multimedia type icon when no thumbnail is available).                                                                                                                                                                 |
| [getItemBinaryThumbnail({ escapedItemId, width, height, })](./open-api-client.binariesservice.getitembinarythumbnail.md)                           | <code>static</code> | Gets the thumbnail image for the binary content contained in a specified Multimedia Component.                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| [upload({ file, })](./open-api-client.binariesservice.upload.md)                                                                                   | <code>static</code> | Uploads a single binary file. This operation returns an instance of 'BinaryUploadResponse' type.                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| [uploadMultimediaComponent({ file, escapedFolderId, title, multimediaSchemaId, })](./open-api-client.binariesservice.uploadmultimediacomponent.md) | <code>static</code> | <p>Uploads a single binary file and creates a multimedia component. This operation returns an instance of 'Component' type.</p><p>The method doesn't support creating of the component based on the multimedia schema having required metadata fields with no default values.</p> |
